title: FREEDOM (LIMITED EDITION)
description: 'Freedom' summer tee in off-whitte. With a captivating art design on the back, this tee adds a touch of creativity to your wardrobe. Embrace summer in style and ezpress your unique spirit with our 'Freedom' tee.

title: SLPLS NIGHTS
description: Freedom doesn’t come easy. This piece connects all of us and reminds us to celebrate all the people endlessly working towards their goals. Wherever you are and whoever you are, we applaud you.

title: FVT CLASSIC
description: Flipping through your wardrobe for the perfect tee to pull your outfit together? Look no further! The Fiveteen Classic is the perfect simple design to give you that effortlessly cool look..

title: PSE SHORTS
description: XV PALMS shorts in classic white. Stay cool and stylish with these versatile and comfortable shorts, perfect for any summer occasion. Elevate your warm-weather look effortlessly with our timeless white shorts.

title: PALMS BLANC
description: Our 'Palms See Everything' summer tee in a captivating off-white color. With a beautiful blend of nature and palm trees, this tee captures the essence of lush tropical landscapes. Embrace the serenity of summer in style with our exquisite tee.

title: FVT LAGOS
description: Celebrating our origins with the Fiveteen Cities tee. We introduce our first pieces from the cities tee. we celebrate cities from all over the world with our debut collection with Lagos and London. More cities dropping too in the future.

title: XV PALMS
description: Flipping through your wardrobe for the perfect tee to pull your outfit together? Look no further! The Fiveteen Classic is the perfect simple design to give you that effortlessly cool look..

title: XVarsity
description: Varsity jacket with padded interior. Double welt pockets at hip and interior pocket. Embroidered appliqué and contrast front and back patches. Rib trim. Front snap button closure.

title: TERRA ORRANGE
description: Nature-inspired summer tee in earthy orange. From the 'Palms See Everything' collection, this vibrant tee embodies the essence of tropical paradise. Embrace the warmth and adventure of summer in style with our stunning tee.

title: XMILEY TOTE
description: XV Smiley Tote Bag, the must-have accessory for your sunny adventures! Made from high-quality materials, this lightweight tote is perfect for carrying your essentials while exuding effortless style. Featuring our brand's Iconic Smiley on top, it adds a touch of elegance and makes a statement wherever you go. Grab your Summer Tote Bag today and embrace summer in style!

title: PSE SHORTS MINI
description: XV PALMS MINI shorts in classic white. Stay cool and stylish with these versatile and comfortable shorts, perfect for any summer occasion. Elevate your warm-weather look effortlessly with our timeless white shorts.
